languages.text: "Ваши исследовательские походы раздвинули границы известного нам пространства. В дальнейшем вы сможете распространить свои владения в эти звездные системы, не опасаясь конкуренции".

traits.locale_text: "Ваши исследовательские походы раздвинули границы известного нам пространства. В дальнейшем вы сможете распространить свои владения в эти звездные системы, не опасаясь конкуренции".

languages.text: "Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of known space. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."
languages.original_text: "Ваши исследовательские походы раздвинули границы известного нам пространства. В дальнейшем вы сможете распространить свои владения в эти звездные системы, не опасаясь конкуренции".

traits.locale_text: "Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of the space known to us. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."

"Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of the space known to us. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."
"Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of known space. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."
"Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of known space. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."
"Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of known space. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンが実地調査を行う冒険の範囲は既知の境界にまで拡大しました。ゆくゆくはその領土を、奪い合いになる心配のない新しい星域にまで広げられるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of known space. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンが実地調査を行う冒険の範囲は既知の境界にまで拡大しました。ゆくゆくはその領土を、奪い合いになる心配のない新しい星域にまで広げられるでしょう」

languages.text: “您的开拓远征拓展了已知空间的边界。接下来，您可以将领土扩张到这些遥远的星系，无需担心其他竞争对手搅局。”
languages.original_text: "Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of known space. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."

traits.locale_text: “您的开拓远征拓展了已知空间的边界。接下来，您可以将领土扩张到这些遥远的星系，无需担心其他竞争对手搅局。”

languages.text: «Sus aventuras exploratorias han ampliado los límites del espacio conocido. En un futuro, podrá ampliar su territorio en estos sistemas estelares sin preocuparse por la competencia».
languages.original_text: "Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of known space. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."

traits.locale_text: «Sus aventuras exploratorias han ampliado los límites del espacio conocido. En un futuro, podrá ampliar su territorio en estos sistemas estelares sin preocuparse por la competencia».

languages.text: « Vos explorations ont permis d'étendre les frontières de l'espace connu. Vous devriez pouvoir conquérir ces nouveaux systèmes sans craindre la concurrence. »
languages.original_text: "Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of known space. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."

traits.locale_text: « Vos explorations ont permis d'étendre les frontières de l'espace connu. Vous devriez pouvoir conquérir ces nouveaux systèmes sans craindre la concurrence. »

languages.text: "Eure Erkundungen haben die Grenzen des bekannten Weltraums erweitert. In Zukunft könnt Ihr Euer Territorium in diese neuen Sternensysteme ausdehnen, ohne Konkurrenz befürchten zu müssen."
languages.original_text: "Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of known space. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Erkundungen haben die Grenzen des bekannten Weltraums erweitert. In Zukunft könnt Ihr Euer Territorium in diese neuen Sternensysteme ausdehnen, ohne Konkurrenz befürchten zu müssen."

languages.text: "Keşif girişimleriniz, bilinen uzayın sınırlarını genişletti. Gelecekte topraklarınızı, rekabet konusunda endişelenmenize gerek kalmadan bu yeni yıldız sistemlerine doğru yayabileceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "Your exploratory ventures have broadened the borders of known space. In the future, you will be able to spread your territory to these new star systems without having to worry about competition."

traits.locale_text: "Keşif girişimleriniz, bilinen uzayın sınırlarını genişletti. Gelecekte bölgenizi, bu yeni yıldız sistemlerine rekabet konusunda endişelenmenize gerek kalmadan yayabileceksiniz."
